creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: left: 自摺　昭和八年作　湖畔之庭 {jizuri, Shōwa hachinen saku, Kohan no niwa} | bottom, printed: A Garden by Biwa Lake | in pencil: Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LRC, embossed artist's baren seal and embossed artist's I seal: 博 {Hiroshi} | red artist's seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: Four Garden Scenes (Niwa yondai 庭四題)
title: Garden by Lake Biwa
